Sets the db representation of a managed entity value in a prepared statement.

Specified by:
setManagedEntityInPrepStatement in interface ManagedEntityValueDBRep
Parameters:
entity - The ManagedEntityValue that contains the attribute's value.
pos - The index position of the prepared statement variable
ps - A PreparedStatement that will contain the db representation of the populated attributes in the managed entity.
Throws:
java.sql.SQLException - thrown if there is a problem setting the db representation of the attribute.
